title: Electronic Performance Support System (EPSS) Development Course for Novice Instructional Designers

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic instructional design theories and experience in language education
context.additional_context: A customized course for current language education practitioners to strengthen EPSS (Electronic Performance Support System) development capabilities.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze functional requirements and design components of an EPSS (Electronic Performance Support System), including tutorials, examples, resources, tools, wizards, etc.
Learners can develop and implement an EPSS prototype to enhance the work efficiency of novice instructional designers (NIDs).
An EPSS evaluation system specialized for the language education domain can be established, and improvement measures can be derived through formative assessment.

resources: EPSS (Electronic Performance Support System) development template

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
